ValidationRule.description: Ensures that Document is linked to either of the three objects: Engagement, Opportunity, Opportunity Outcome.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: NOT( OR( AND ( NOT(ISBLANK(Opportunity__c)), ISBLANK(Opportunity_Outcome__c), ISBLANK(Engagement__c) ), AND ( ISBLANK(Opportunity__c), NOT(ISBLANK(Opportunity_Outcome__c)), ISBLANK(Engagement__c) ), AND ( ISBLANK(Opportunity__c), ISBLANK(Opportunity_Outcome__c), NOT(ISBLANK(Engagement__c)) ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please ensure Document is linked to either of the three objects: Engagement, Opportunity, Opportunity Outcome.
